DOC.brief_summary: Choices Plus , randomize control study , determine efficacy Project CHOICES intervention plus referral evidence-based smoking cessation program reduce risk alcohol- tobacco-exposed pregnancy .
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize control study examine effect ChoicesPlus intervention compare Treatment Usual ( TAU ) : reduce alcohol use establish risk level ; increase consistent use effective contraception ; increase engagement smoke cessation treatment increase smoke cessation . In addition , examination incremental cost ChoicesPlus intervention ( e.g. , staff time , material , administrative service , total medical charge pre- post-intervention ) provide basis future cost/benefit analysis inform policymakers healthcare organization potential benefit implement ChoicesPlus . Results study inform advance future effort service promote healthy prenatal behavior reduce prevalence alcohol tobacco-exposed pregnancy .
DOC.criteria: Have condition cause infertility Are pregnant plan become pregnant next 9 month Have vaginal intercourse previous 3 month fertile man without use effective contraception Are drink risk level ; 5 ) available followup period . Infertile Pregnant Insufficient locator information Language English Spanish
